Class pttdrawonly

  • java.lang.Object
    • pttdrawonly

  • public class pttdrawonly
extends java.lang.Object

    Create Random Music!

    The pttdrawonly outputs randomly generated music and a dynamically generated visualization

    Since:
    2014-011-18

      • map

        public static double map(double num,
         double cmin,
         double cmax,
         double nmin,
         double nmax)
        This method is used to map decimal numbers of a certain range to a new range
        Parameters:
        num - This is the original number that needs to be mapped
        cmin - This is the minimum value of the original range
        cmax - This is the maximum value of the original range
        nmin - This is the minimum value of the new range
        nmax - This is the maximum value of the new range
        Returns:
        double This returns the value of the mapped number

        Parameters:
        i - This is the ith note of the sequence of notes
        duration - This is the duration of that note
        pitch - This is the pitch of that note=

      • volume

        public static double[] volume(double hz,
              double duration,
              double vol)
        This method is used to change the volume of the notes
        Parameters:
        hz - This is the frequency of the note
        duration - This is the duration of the note
        vol - This is the decimal you want the volume of the note to be multiplied by
        Returns:
        double[] This returns an array of y-values of the wave of the sound
